short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Gmail experience by adding color-coded emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail Enhancer: Customize Your Inbox with Color-Coded Emails

Make your Gmail experience more organized and visually appealing with Gmail Enhancer! This handy extension allows you to assign custom colors to emails from specific senders, making it easier than ever to prioritize, identify, and manage your inbox.

Key Features:
- Color-Coded Emails: Assign unique colors to emails based on the sender’s address. Instantly spot important messages and stay on top of your most crucial communications.
- Easy Customization: With a user-friendly interface, you can add, edit, or remove email color settings in just a few clicks.
- Seamless Integration: Gmail Enhancer works seamlessly within your existing Gmail interface, enhancing your workflow without any disruption.
- Persistent Settings: Your color preferences are saved and synced, ensuring your customized email colors are consistent across sessions, even when you close your browser or restart your computer.
- Clean and Modern Design: Enjoy a sleek, intuitive interface that blends perfectly with Gmail’s design, making it simple to navigate and manage your color settings.
Why Use Gmail Enhancer?

Whether you're managing personal emails, work correspondence, or simply looking to add a splash of color to your inbox, Gmail Enhancer provides the tools you need to stay organized and efficient. No more digging through endless emails—now you can visually prioritize and manage your inbox with ease.
